dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: The ILU Codes Dataset contains unique intermodal standardized owner codes used for identifying loading units in Europe, specifically focusing on the patterns of text that are to be translated.
dcterms:title: ILU Codes Dataset

dcterms:description: The Tesseract OCR Dataset provides documentation and guidelines for improving the quality of text recognition using the Tesseract OCR engine.
dcterms:title: Tesseract OCR Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jiri Matas
Charles Galambos
Josef Kittler
dcterms:description: The Progressive Probabilistic Hough Transform Dataset is used for robust detection of lines in images, which is critical for text area detection in scene text recognition.
dcterms:title: Progressive Probabilistic Hough Transform Dataset

dcterms:creator: K Karthick
KB Ravindrakumar
R Francis
S Ilankannan
dcterms:description: The Text Recognition Dataset discusses the steps involved in text recognition and recent research in OCR, providing insights into methodologies and challenges faced in the field.
dcterms:title: Text Recognition Dataset

dcterms:creator: Nitin Ramesh
Aksha Srivastava
K Deeba
dcterms:description: The Optical Character Recognition Techniques Dataset provides insights into improving OCR techniques, which are essential for enhancing text recognition accuracy.
dcterms:title: Optical Character Recognition Techniques Dataset

dcterms:creator: Qiuhau Lin
Tong Zhang
Derek Ma
dcterms:description: The Mobile Camera Based Text Detection Dataset focuses on detecting and translating text captured by mobile cameras, relevant for real-time text recognition applications.
dcterms:title: Mobile Camera Based Text Detection Dataset
